translation.en: I can't.
You can't, or you won't?
Goodbye.

translation.en: Desgraciado.
I bet all those muscles are probably fake too.

translation.en: Oh no. They are very real.

What are you talking about?

made a superstar come into our house.

And I got to perform it onstage in front of a packed house at a fancy theater.

translation.en: It was horrible.
[giggles] That's not what I meant, and you know it.

translation.en: -You have a crush on her. -[Miguel] Oh yeah?
What do you know about crushes?
Dad, it's about to be my quinceañera.

translation.en: You know, that whole thing about becoming a woman.
I'm not a kid anymore. I know about crushes.
translation.fr: J'ai grandi. Je m'y connais un peu.

translation.en: And I… I just thought she liked you too.
-[scoffs] It's complicated. -Complicated?
When Ricardo Santoval thought
that Ruby was dead for five years,
translation.fr: que Ruby était morte depuis cinq ans,

translation.en: he married her sister,
only to discover that Ruby was alive
translation.fr: avant de découvrir que Ruby était en vie

translation.en: but paralyzed and loca,
living under an assumed identity in Oaxaca.
translation.fr: vivant sous une fausse identité à Oaxaca.

translation.en: That was complicated.
What's in your heart is simple.
translation.fr: Le cœur est simple à comprendre.

translation.en: You just need to follow it.
Now, cállense!
My show's starting.
So, I talked to Fashion Beat.
They want you for the spring cover.
That's great.
Oh no. Did Barry change his mind again?
translation.fr: Oh, non. Barry a encore changé d'avis ?

translation.en: No, I'm here as a fan
translation.fr: Non, je suis là en tant que fan,

translation.en: and to say that, uh, there's no hard feelings.
translation.fr: et pour vous direque je ne vous en veux pas.

translation.en: I know how it goes.
You know, for the record, it doesn't have to be that way.
translation.fr: Pour info,ça pourrait se passer autrement.

translation.en: There is enough room for both of us, Cheri.
translation.fr: Il y a de la place pour nous deux, Cheri.

translation.en: And…
Look, I don't really know you, but you seem really sweet.
translation.fr: Je ne te connais pas vraiment, mais… tu as l'air adorable.

translation.en: I don't wanna be pitted against you.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas être ta rivale.

translation.en: I wanna cheer you on.
-I wanna celebrate your wins. -[Cheri squeals with delight]
-I wanna cheer you on too. -[Angelina chuckles]
Well, thank you so much for being here.
translation.fr: En tout cas, merci d'être là.

translation.en: Where is that guy?
Your boyfriend?
-Oh, uh, Ricardo. That's… That's over. -[Monique scoffs]
Oh, bummer.
He played a mean piano.
Yeah, he… he was never my boyfriend. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Il n'a jamais été mon petit ami.

translation.en: -Oh, could have fooled me. -Could have fooled all of us.
translation.fr: - J'aurais dit, pourtant !- On aurait tous dit.

translation.en: Well, that's sad because you two are pretty magical together.
translation.fr: C'est dommage parce que… Vous étiez magiques sur scène.

translation.en: She ain't wrong.
My favorite musician
once wrote that home is where the heart is, so…
translation.fr: a écrit : "Où bat notre cœur,se trouve notre foyer."

translation.en: You know what?
I gotta go. [chuckles]
You go. I'll handle it.
[whispers] Okay.
[chuckles] Um, what's happening?
It looks like you're performing tonight, after all.

translation.en: Break a leg.
Two more minutes. Coming through, guys.
Ah, thank you.
You ready?
I learn so much from you every day.
And you shine brighter than I could have ever imagined.

translation.en: I'm so proud of you, mija.

translation.en: And I'm proud to be your dad.

translation.en: [tearfully] And your mom would be so proud of you too.
translation.fr: Ta mère serait fière de toi aussi.

family, and honored guests,
I present to you
Cristina Adriana Torres, La Quinceañera!
♪ I know, I know You're here to stay ♪

Even more.

You should call her.
-[Miguel] Hey! -Hey.
You look amazing! [laughs]
Best quince ever!
Oh, good!
And…
now you can finally have yours. [giggles]
Thank you.
-Hey. -Hey.
-Do you wanna dance? -Yes! [giggles]
What about SNL?
Oh, you know, I told them I already had plans.

You said something about making plans?
Yeah, I'm, um, still working on those.
Maybe you can help me.
Maybe. What are you doing for Christmas?
Christmas?
-With you? -[chuckling]
Oh, you're gonna have to get a sweater though.
A real ugly one.
Oh, I got a line on those.

after?
We'll figure it out.
[Angelina] Mira, we're number one!
